channel.title: Call me stupid or watever but plz help
channel.description: ok.. i have been through every one of these forums trying to find an answer to my problem.. but i cant get my compiler and runserver to work for some reason... i have read mod taharoks's tutorial on how to make a private server and he has so many thanks from it so idk y mines not working... well anyways... at firstwhen i tried this without lookin at everything my compiler said somthing like could not find right path.. so i looked into a few topics and copied and pasted wat it told me to... then i started getting this cannot reconize so and so message... and now that ive read mod taharok's tutorial it says the filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect... wat am i suposed to do? i have jdk 1.5.0 v9 and have this updater thing from no-ip.com installed and working.. i made my server on no-ip.com and it says its connected or watever... only problem is.. i cant get it to log on.. can someone plz! help me... say im stupid or retarded if u must.. but im missing somthing :confused:

item.title: Call me stupid or watever but plz help
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

dude put compiler as this @echo off color f0 title YOURSERVERNAME "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac" -d *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Call me stupid or watever but plz help

item.title: Call me stupid or watever but plz help

item.description:
@aber wrote:

edite compiler with this

@echo off title ''The Last PK'' Compiler color B "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

item.title: Call me stupid or watever but plz help
item.dc:creator: @mason mason
item.description:
@mason wrote:

Maybe you, have different users like when u start your computer it says the differnet users?

Name 1

Name 2

Name 3?

it displays a few users nad when u click it it logs onto that user, maybe you have to set up the inside of compile and runserver differently like i had to because i have differnt users on my comp, you juts have to change like… /documents/(user)/(theprogam)/ and so on like, after my computer and stuff change it to the user your logged on as.

And if i made no sense sorry.
